about_the_game:
No post-apocalyptic or dystopian game would be complete without some ruined streets. The GameGuru MAX Wasteland Booster Pack - City Streets provides not only ruins, but damaged and intact abandoned buildings AND a snappable road network. Included in the pack you'll find a collection of over 150 custom-made Wasteland themed assets, ideal for the Dark Future, Wartorn and Modern Day genres.

Apart from the roads and buildings you'll also get a large collection of street furniture, including road signs, street lamps, traffic lights, post boxes and more.

Lastly, the pack includes a number of unique custom buildings, such as police and fire stations, medical centers and fuel stations.

No post-apocalyptic or dystopian game would be complete without some ruined streets. The GameGuru MAX Wasteland Booster Pack - City Streets provides not only ruins, but damaged and intact abandoned buildings AND a snappable road network. Included in the pack you'll find a collection of over 150 custom-made Wasteland themed assets, ideal for the Dark Future, Wartorn and Modern Day genres.

Apart from the roads and buildings you'll also get a large collection of street furniture, including road signs, street lamps, traffic lights, post boxes and more.

Lastly, the pack includes a number of unique custom buildings, such as police and fire stations, medical centers and fuel stations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

short_description: No post-apocalyptic or dystopian game would be complete without some ruined streets. The GameGuru MAX Wasteland Booster Pack - City Streets includes ruins, specialist buildings, roads and street furniture.
